general.name: Name
general.noSkillFound: This skill does not exist or could not be found at this time.
general.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
general.enrollToInteractDescription: Join this group to interact with the teachers and students.
general.searchFeedbackRequests: Search for a group, skill or student
general.confirmDeleteEntity: Are you sure you want to delete this {entity}?

definitions.skills: A skill is a specific ability that you can learn, develop, and apply. “Pitching” or “Networking” are examples of skills.
definitions.competencies: A competence is a collection of related skills that together enable you to perform well in a specific area. The competence “Researching” might include skills such as “Interviewing” and “Reflecting”.
definitions.groups: A group is a training program that you can enroll in and work on different skills.
definitions.profiles: A profile represents a set of competencies needed to excel in a role or field. If you master multiple competencies of a profile, it means you are an excellent candidate for that role or field.
definitions.feedbackRequests: Feedback requests are requests you can send to others to receive feedback on your skills. You can receive and send feedback requests to teachers and students.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You currently have no notifications. Once you receive feedback or endorsements, they will appear here.

modals.feedbackDescription: Provide detailed feedback on the student's skill
modals.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

updateStarRating.title: Update stars rating
updateStarRating.description: Provide feedback explaining why you updated your rating; keep in mind the new rating is temporary until a teacher endorses it.
updateStarRating.ratingToLow: Your new rating is lower than the current rating

addFeedback.title: Add feedback
addFeedback.description: Provide examples, strengths, areas for improvement, and suggestions to reflect on and improve your skills
addFeedback.requestDescription: {requester} has requested feedback on the skill {skill} from the {group} group.

requestEndorsement.title: Request endorsement
requestEndorsement.fromEmaildescription: Enter the work email of the person who will write the endorsement.
requestEndorsement.fromUserdescription: Ask {name} for an endorsement on a specific skill.
requestEndorsement.workEmailDescription: An email will be sent with a link to your skill. This link will work only once.

requestFeedback.title: Request feedback
requestFeedback.fromEmaildescription: Enter the email of the person who will write the feedback.
requestFeedback.fromUserdescription: Ask {name} for feedback on a specific skill.

endorsementRequest.title: Endorsement request
endorsementRequest.requestExpired: This endorsement request has expired, please ask the student to send a new request.
endorsementRequest.skillRatingDescription: Rate the skill from 1 to 4 stars

updatePersonalCoach.title: Update personal coach
updatePersonalCoach.description: Select a coach to help you with your personal development. This person will have insight into your skills and your continued progress.

upsertGroup.descriptionPlaceholder: E.g. Learning conversation skills isn’t done through reading; the goal is for students to gain practical experience.
